title: Lakshmi Mittal
summary: Lakshmi Niwas Mittal (Hindi: [ˈləkʃmi nɪˈʋaːs ˈmɪtːəl] (listen); born 15 June 1950) is an Indian steel magnate,[6] based in the United Kingdom. He is the Executive Chairman of ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaking company,[7] as well as Chairman of stainless steel manufacture Aperam.[8] Mittal owns 38% of ArcelorMittal and holds a 20% stake in EFL Championship side Queens Park Rangers.[9]
